definition: foreign lands and places (idiom); living as expatriate
different/other/hetero-/unusual/strange/surprising/to distinguish/to separate/to discriminate
surname Guo
country/nation/state/national/CL:個|个[ge4]
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: How many died on foreign soil?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人死在了异国他乡？

sentences.english: You are more aware of that you are a Chinese only when you're living abroad.
sentences.chinese: 生活在异国他乡，才更能认识到自己是一个中国人。

sentences.english: Their sense of solidarity is deepened by the loneliness of being in a foreign country.
sentences.chinese: 他们的团结意识由于深处异国他乡而更加深化了。

sentences.english: Marriagesomeone fromdifferent country does require some extra effort.
sentences.chinese: 和异国他乡人结婚真需要更多努力。

sentences.english: Living in foreign country, you'll have a better understanding of yourself being a Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 生活在异国他乡，才更能认识到自己是一个中国人。

sentences.english: I wanted to explain that doing laundry abroad had never been quite so much fun.
sentences.chinese: 在异国他乡的洗衣店里，我从未感到如此地愉快过。

sentences.english: and travel to this foreign country to meet his pen pal from 30 years before.
sentences.chinese: 远赴异国他乡寻找他30年前的笔友。

sentences.english: It’s his first time living abroad.
sentences.chinese: 这是他首次生活在异国他乡。

sentences.english: Marriage to someone from a different country does require some extra effort.
sentences.chinese: 和一个异国他乡的人结婚真的是需要更多的努力。

sentences.english: Pretend you're on vacation overseas and can't afford the rate.
sentences.chinese: 假装你正在异国他乡度假，支付不起当地汇率。

sentences.english: As an inhabitant of a foreign country, the willingness to return to his ancestral home always lingers in the old man's mind.
sentences.chinese: 落叶归根的情怀一直萦绕在身处异国他乡的老人心中。
